/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below.

Power lines crisscross above the street, forming an intricate web that hints at the city's complex infrastructure. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Among them, a white building with a blue roof stands out, adding a splash of color to the scene.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Cars and buses move along it, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. Pedestrians can be seen as well, going about their day, adding a human element to the urban landscape.

The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings and power lines. This perspective not only emphasizes the height of the buildings and the complexity of the power lines but also gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
